Comments: \u00a77\u00a7o7 pages, no figures. Additional material added regarding the proposed use of eitherheavy ion beams from accelerators or cosmicrays as alternate stimulus sources. This is based on existing research involving the effect
of heavy ions on the EEGs of mice and brain tumor patients and of cosmic rays on the EEGs of astronauts\u00a7r
